relation: Gen. George C. Marshall, Gen. Henry H. Arnold, Adm. Ernest J. King
Spkr. Sam T. Rayburn, Sen. Tom Connally, Amon Carter, Rep. R. Ewing Thomason Note: Conflict with usher's log
(lunch - under magnolia tree) Mrs. John Boettiger
Press Conf. PC #954 (FDR) (Press and Radio Conference) (Elmer Davis)
(dinner) ER, Maj. and Mrs. John Boettiger
Radio broadcast, no pictures from Diplomatic Reception Room
FDR's D-Day Prayer on the Invasion of Normandy in Diplomatic Reception Room
Miss Margaret Suckley (dep. 9:15), Lt. Comdr. and Mrs. Charles McIllwraith (dep. 6:45)

textAfterTable: USH = White House Usher's Diary, STE = Stenographer's Diary, PC = Press Conference, TU = Tully's Appointment Diary These transcripts are based on archival sources documenting President Roosevelt's daily activities, including the White House Usher's Log and the White House Stenographer's Diary. The transcripts were created for reference purposes.
